analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Allocations.grantAdvisorToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x4417bfedebf719832d0c841f7749f7381aa5ec61.sol#667-674):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,SafeMath.div(advisorSupply,4)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4417bfedebf719832d0c841f7749f7381aa5ec61.sol#672-673)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- advisorCounter (/unique_chucks/10/0x4417bfedebf719832d0c841f7749f7381aa5ec61.sol#673-674)

	- token.mint(founderAddress,SafeMath.div(founderSupply,4)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4417bfedebf719832d0c841f7749f7381aa5ec61.sol#680-684)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- founderCounter (/unique_chucks/10/0x4417bfedebf719832d0c841f7749f7381aa5ec61.sol#684)
